pkgmetadata.longdescription: Symmetric File Encryption Using GPG // Provides easy symmetric file encryption using GPG with cryptographically strong defaults. Only symmetric encryption is supported. GPG is pre- installed with most Linux distributions. Windows users will need to install 'Gpg4win' (http://www.gpg4win.org/). OS X users will need to install 'GPGTools' (https://gpgtools.org/).
